QuestData.Title: House Waycrest
QuestData.Description:
You have done much for my home and the people of Drustvar,
Tell your allies that House Waycrest will return to Boralus shortly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Taelia in the Harbormaster's Office in Boralus.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Taelia in the Harbormaster's Office in Boralus.
QuestData.RewardText:
I cannot believe all that has gone on in Drustvar!
I am thankful that House Waycrest will return.
